name: dryingTime_increase
description: This function is used to increase the operating time of the dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the drying time.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to increase the drying time.

parameters.name: dryingTimer
parameters.description: The amount of time in minutes to increase the drying timer.
